QuestData.Title: The Time for Mercy has Passed
QuestData.Description: This cavern is an abomination, $n. And it's filled with horrors from the depths.$B$BI don't want any of these - things - getting through the portal to the outside world. Slay everything!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 10 Molten Tormentors and 4 Shadowflame Masters.
QuestData.CompletionText: This cavern fills my lungs with heat and my eyes with ash. Are you faring any better?
QuestData.RewardText: So it is done.$B$BKnowing that Twilight's Hammer is in league with creatures of malice such as these... it really curdles the blood.
